text.section:
If a person does not file a federal income tax return, the person shall compute Maryland taxable income in accordance with the cash or accrual accounting method that:
the person uses to compute income regularly in keeping the person's books; or
the Comptroller requires to reflect clearly the person's income.

If a person does not file a federal income tax return, the person shall compute Maryland taxable income:
for the calendar year; or
if the person keeps adequate records for an annual fiscal year accounting period, for the fiscal year.
